title: Herbal Detox Tea | Verbena
description: Wellness Herbal Tea-Small Batch-Made in the USA-Decaffeinated These herbs are historically noted for their detoxifying properties. Ingredients: Organic cinnamon pieces, dandelion root, burdock root, organic ginger root, fennel seed, organic licorice root, organic juniper berries, organic black peppercorns, orange peel, organic cloves, organic cardamom pods, pau d'arco, uva ursi, horsetail and parsley. Brew tea at 203º - Use 1-2 tsp. leaf per 8 oz. water. Allow boiling water to cool slightly, then pour over leaves. Steep 4 minutes.
cleaned_text: at 203º - Use 1-2 tsp. leaf per 8 oz. water. Allow boiling water to cool slightly, then pour over leaves. Steep 4 minutes.
